name: Almond Khatan Tin
description: A beautifully presented tin filled with delicious, crumbly almond shortbread cookies (Khatai). Perfect for gifting on any occasion.

name: Almond Biscotti
description: Crisp and crunchy almond biscotti, elegantly packaged for gifting. Ideal for enjoying with coffee or tea.

name: Almond Khatai Box 7 pieces
description: A delightful gift box containing 7 pieces of traditional, melt-in-your-mouth almond shortbread cookies (Khatai).

name: Almond Khatai Box 12 pieces
description: A generous gift box featuring 12 pieces of our signature almond shortbread cookies (Khatai), perfect for sharing.

name: Almond Khatai Fancy Box
description: Exquisite almond shortbread cookies (Khatai) presented in a luxurious fancy box, making it an impressive gift.

name: Almond Macaroon
description: Delicate and chewy almond macaroons, beautifully packaged for a sweet and thoughtful gift.

name: Arabian Sweet
description: An opulent assortment of traditional Arabian sweets, exquisitely packaged to make a luxurious gift for connoisseurs.

name: Besan Khatai
description: Traditional gram flour (besan) shortbread cookies, known for their unique flavor and crumbly texture, in a gift-ready pack.

name: Cake Gift Bag
description: A delicious cake of your choice, beautifully presented in an elegant gift bag. A perfect celebratory gift.

name: Cane Gift Basket (Empty)
description: A charming empty cane gift basket, perfect for creating your own personalized gift hamper with our finest treats.

name: Cane Gift Basket
description: A beautifully arranged cane gift basket filled with a curated selection of our most popular gourmet treats and snacks.

name: Chocolate Chip Box 16 pieces
description: A delightful gift box containing 16 classic, soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies. A universally loved treat.

name: Chocolate Crisp
description: Thin, delicate, and intensely chocolatey crisp biscuits, elegantly packaged for a sophisticated gift.

name: Chocolate Walnut Biscotti
description: Crunchy biscotti generously studded with rich chocolate chunks and walnuts, presented in a gift-worthy pack.

name: Coconut Cookies
description: Buttery cookies with a delightful tropical coconut flavor, attractively packaged for gifting.

name: Countryside Biscuit
description: A charming assortment of rustic and wholesome countryside-style biscuits, perfect for a heartwarming gift.

name: Cranberry Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies packed with tart cranberries and often white chocolate chips, in a beautiful gift box.

name: Flax Snap
description: Healthy and crispy flaxseed snaps, a nutritious and thoughtful gift for the health-conscious.

name: French Heart Box
description: An elegant gift box filled with sweet, crispy, heart-shaped puff pastries (palmiers). A delightful French classic.

name: Fruit Cake Rusk
description: Deliciously crispy rusk made from rich fruit cake, packed with mixed dried fruits. A wonderful gift for tea lovers.

name: Ginger Cake Rusk
description: Crispy and aromatic rusk made from spiced ginger cake, offering a warm flavor. A unique and comforting gift.

name: Hard Nougat
description: Classic hard nougat packed with crunchy nuts and sweetened with honey, presented as an elegant gift.

name: Honey Nougat
description: Soft and chewy honey nougat, generously filled with almonds or other nuts. A sweet and luxurious gift.

name: Lemon Crisp
description: Thin, zesty, and refreshing lemon-flavored crisp biscuits, beautifully packaged for a light and delightful gift.

name: Marzipan
description: Exquisite almond marzipan confections, often artfully shaped and colored. A traditional and sophisticated gift.

name: Multiseed Biscotti
description: Wholesome and crunchy biscotti packed with a variety of nutritious seeds, making a healthy and thoughtful gift.

name: Oatlay
description: Delicious and wholesome oatmeal cookies, possibly with raisins or nuts, presented in a gift-ready pack.

name: Pistachio Biscotti
description: Premium crunchy biscotti featuring the rich flavor and vibrant color of pistachios. An elegant gift choice.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection 250 g
description: A delightful 250g gift pack from our Royal Biscuit Collection, offering an assortment of fine, buttery biscuits.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection 500 g
description: A generous 500g gift pack of our Royal Biscuit Collection, featuring a wider variety of exquisite biscuits.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection
description: Our premium Royal Biscuit Collection presented in an elegant, reusable tin. A luxurious selection perfect for gifting.

name: Season Snap
description: Crisp and savory snaps or crackers featuring seasonal flavors and ingredients. A unique and timely gift.

name: Shopping bag (Synthetic)
description: A stylish and durable synthetic shopping bag, perfect for presenting your gifts or as a practical gift itself.

name: Vanilla Crisp
description: Thin, delicate, and fragrant vanilla-flavored crisp biscuits, elegantly packaged for a classic gift.

name: Wooden Gift Basket
description: A beautifully crafted wooden gift basket, pre-filled with an assortment of our finest gourmet products. An impressive gift for any occasion.

name: Wooden Hexagonal Gift Basket
description: A unique and stylish hexagonal wooden gift basket, filled with a premium selection of treats. Perfect for making a statement.

name: Wooden Hexagonal Gifting Basket
description: An empty, elegant hexagonal wooden basket, ideal for creating a bespoke, high-end gift hamper.

name: Wooden Rope Gift Basket (Empty)
description: A rustic yet elegant empty wooden gift basket with rope handles, providing a charming base for your custom gift selection.
